Medium: All the drawings are in pen and brown ink, some are modelled with brush and gray wash and watercolor; the watercolor may or may not be a later addition; many of the designs exhibit underdrawing in graphite (or leadpoint) or red chalk, over some ruler and compass construction.
Credit Line: The Elisha Whittelsey Collection, The Elisha Whittelsey Fund, 1949
Provenance: David Landau(his ex-libris pasted on inside of front cover)
